gnu.math.statistics
Interface Function

All Known Implementing Classes:

public interface Function

This interface gives the requirements for a function.

Method Summary

public boolean isContinuous()
Return true if this is a continuous function.

Returns:
boolean True if continuous, false otherwise.

isDiscrete

Return true if this is a discrete function.

Returns:
boolean True if discrete, false otherwise.
